Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory122.png'}
{3: 'Babylonia Ground Frontier, Airforce Base 28, Battle Preparation Room'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...That's... what happened.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Sorry... If I got there quicker, I might've been able to save him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'The very first virus outbreak... Took place just after I left Islay.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Do you know that Islay made the best whisky? I really miss that peat flavor...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'My wife had some leg problems. She could only walk out to the garden...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Is she alright?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Like most people, she died in that disaster, leaving nothing behind.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Look at me, Captain, "Beak of Islay", what a fancy name! But I couldn\'t even protect my own family!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "I learned this the hard way long ago. But my son didn't understand...! I cut off all the possible ways for him to join the army, only to find out he joined the mercenary...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "I only learned about his death after three months! Three bloody months... There wasn't even a proper obituary...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: '(Coughs fiercely)', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Calm down.', 4: '2'}

{3: 'Cyril refuses the water offered by Watanabe. He supports himself with a hand on the desk. For quite some time, his chest moved up and down before he finally raises his head and stares at Watanabe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: "What happened to you after that? I heard the Construct reconstruction surgery isn't easy... Did you do it because of the pay?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'To be honest, I joined the mercenary for the money in the beginning.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Some wanted fame, some wanted wealth. Some might do it out of impulse. But the army is never as simple as you think, young blood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'With all due respect, Captain, Bruce never joined the army out of impulse. He had his beliefs...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If you could have more time with him, I'm sure you would be proud of him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I could not understand why Bruce insisted to stay and continue searching.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But since then I've witnessed too many tragedies and lost too many people...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I walked 10km in the snow, dead bodies everywhere. Broken limbs hung from trees like firecrackers.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: "This is a world where human lives don't matter anymore.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But now, I slowly begin to understand Bruce.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'If I became a Construct... I may be able to kill one more Corrupted and save one more person. I never had any direction in life, but ever since I became a Construct, I found the reason to live on.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Bruce taught me that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'He was a great friend.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Cyril does not reply. He looks away and picks up a file on the desk.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Do you know what they are shipping this time, kid?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Maintenance equipment and supplies?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'That\'s what they told everyone else. But really, they are just sending the "VIPs" and their belongings away from the war.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Cyril tosses the folder to Watanabe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: "See for yourself. Here's the list of passengers and supplies on board.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The Earth Minister of Administration, Secretary of the Treasury, Administrator of Area 50 to 72...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Metropolitan Museum 272 pieces of grade 1 collections, 360 pieces of grade 2 collections; private gallery contribution... Owner... Earth Minister of Immigration?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Humans are going extinct, but Babylonia still has the luxury to ship artworks. Very admirable, don't you think?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...Babylonia is in a very special situation. We can't rule out the possibility that some people with ill intent are planning something.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'How did you get this confidential information?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Don't forget I served three times longer than you did.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Have you realized the true nature of those people, young man?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'This government that you are fighting for... Are they the saviors, or just a bunch of cowards... You better see with your own eyes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Thank you for the advice, Captain Cyril.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But we are still soldiers, fighting for humanity.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The duty of a soldier is to obey orders. We can only do our best to complete the mission.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Haha, you're right, young man.", 4: '2'}
